Virginia Beach, VA Metro > Virginia Beach > Restaurants > North End Pizza North End Pizza (757) 428-2002 3420 Atlantic Ave , Virginia Beach , VA | Directions 23451 36.862401 -75.979300 View Website Menu Share Save Own this Business? Recommend this business? Thumbs Up Thumbs Down ? 67 % 100 3 3 Votes Add a Photo Neighborhoods: Northeast, Northeast Virginia Beach Categories: Restaurants Cuisine: Pizza View More Payment Methods: MasterCard, Visa View Less Site Feedback Overview Tips (3) Photos (0) Write a Tip for North End Pizza Sign in to Write a Tip Write a Tip... optional
Tips for North End Pizza Recommends modbapt Joined 2 years ago 5.0 September 30, 2010 Incredible food and service. I live five minutes from North End Pizza and eat there two or three times a week. They have incredible food and service! The pizza and subs are made of a NY/NJ style crust/bread which I love! The stromboli and manicotti are particularly delicious! Great appetizers (extra crispy fries and onion rings along with fried mushrooms and zucchini) are fantastic. I have had so many great experiences at this Oceanfront restaurant! My guests that come to the beach love it! I usually avoid the"tourist"restaurants at the Oceanfront (Poor service, lackluster and overpriced food,"you are just a number"kinds of places.) North End Pizza is not that kind of place! A family owned eatery that cares for their customers. The owners and employees treat you as honored guests. I continue to eat there every week for these reasons. Who wouldn't? … View More View Less 0 Heart Doesn't Recommend spanky26 Joined 2 years ago 1.0 July 24, 2010 Hot Sweaty&Dirty. If u don't mind sacrificing cleanliness&good customer service, this is the place for you! Anyone who thinks this is New York style pizza, obviously has never had true NEW YORK STYLE PIZZA! Where is the sauce!!CHICKEN? ANY AREA FAST FOOD RESTAURANT HAS BETTER CHICKEN! McDonald's Wendys Burger King etc.....Fries? Don't do it unless you want Cold Greasy Jerky style potatoes!Not Good!&to top it off, the Manager Should be Fired for running such a Hot Sweaty Fly infested"SOUP KITCHEN"TRUST ME TRUE PIZZA LOVERS&LOVERS OF YOUR SPOUSE&KIDS, KEEP EVERYONE SAFE AND FIND SOMETHING OTHER THAN THIS"HOLE IN A WALL"to eat!! … View More View Less 0 Heart Recommends OneWordANTHEM Joined 3 years ago 5.0 June 12, 2009 Best Pizza at the beach, hands down.. I've been eating at North End for about 15 years now and the food hasn't changed. From their authentic NY-style pizzas to their Philly cheese steaks and delicious Greek salads, North End never fails to satisfy. Whether it's lunch after a day on the beach or delivery that night, it beats any chain restaurant around. … View More View Less 0 Heart
